price: Banacuze imigambi mibisha (ubwo abahakanyi bashakaga kwica Issa), Allah na we acura imigambi (yo kuburizamo iyabo). Kandi Allah ni We uhebuje mu kuburizamo imigambi y’abantu babi.
arabic: وَمَكَرُواْ وَمَكَرَ ٱللَّهُۖ وَٱللَّهُ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡمَٰكِرِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wamakarū wamakara al-lahu wal-lahu khayru al-mākirīna
